price: 87 Tous les espoirs qu’ils avaient placés dans leurs divinités s’étant évanouis, les impies feront, ce Jour-là, acte de soumission à Allah.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alqaw ilā al-lahi yawma-idhin al-salama waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
